overview: Conny Dachs, Germany's most famous male pornstar, tells us exciting stories from his life. We can witness how he "does" a slutty house maid. By much more than holding hands, he is invited by three charming ladies to a noble villa. And even on the barbers chair, the singing contender manages to get a ménage-à-trois with two horny girls. This way his separation from the beloved mustache is a little easier for him.
title: My Life as Conny Dachs
